job_tasks.phrase: Test design and test documentation maintenance
job_tasks.justification: Designing and maintaining test documentation are integral parts of the software development process, ensuring quality and maintainability.
Executing various types of tests (functional, performance, regression) is a core software engineering activity focused on ensuring the quality and reliability of software.
This phrase indicates interaction and information exchange with stakeholders, which falls under communication and collaboration.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement describes tasks related to Quality Assurance (QA) engineering, specifically manual testing, requirements analysis, and test environment maintenance. None of these tasks align with the core software engineering (Macro-Category A) or AI Specialization (Macro-Category B) as defined in the coding book. The role is focused on testing existing or developing software rather than building or integrating AI/ML models.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and specific about the tasks involved, which are exclusively related to manual QA engineering. There is no mention of AI/ML development, integration, or specialization, making the classification straightforward.
